original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 321.00/323.50 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed marginally down at at 321.00/323.50 to the US dollar on Friday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 319.50/321.00 to the US dollar on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 13.30/50 up at from closing on Wednesday at 13.10/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 closed at 13.40/60 percent stable from closing at 13.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 14.35/40 percent up from closing at 14.25/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 14.60/65 percent up from closing at 14.45/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 15.90/16.05 percent up from closing at 15.85/16.00 percent. (Colombo/Aug03/2023)
